title: We Poddin'
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss the slumping Warriors, who the next face of the NBA will be, Calvin Ridley's suspension, and why Brittner Griner (and other WNBA players) shouldn't have to supplement their income by playing overseas. Plus, how Swagu will celebrate his birthday and the debut of a new segment: Family Reunion.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
